fact: Pakistan is home to the second-highest mountain in the world, K2.
Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
Australia is the only continent covered by a single country.
Japan is made up of over 6,800 islands.
Brazil is the largest producer of coffee in the world.
Germany is home to the world's largest beer festival, Oktoberfest.
South Africa has three capital cities, each serving different branches of government.
Egypt is home to the oldest surviving wonder of the ancient world, the Great Pyramid of Giza.
Rome is the only city in the world that contains an independent country within it—the Vatican City.
India is the world's largest democracy, with over 1.4 billion people.
